description: MDGs-Based Poverty Reduction and Growth Strategy implementation, coordination and monitoring

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: To contribute to the enhancement of poverty reduction and sustainable development in The Gambia through the provision of support to the implementation, coordination and monitoring of an MDG-based Poverty Reduction and Growth Strategy (PRGS), while strengthening national and local capacities for monitoring progress, coordinate implementation and aid resources and mobilising resources for poverty reduction towards the attainment of MDGs.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support to MGD-based PRGS Impl
